page.title: 15ROWLANDS CASTLE ASSN. 2
page.content: There has been a suggestion that the name of the village be changed to Rowlands Green and the villagers intend to publish a history of the village and "Rolokescastel" which lies in the grounds of "Deerleap" to justify the retention of the name. Another matter being discussed by the association and the parish council is the state of 2 or 3 dilapitated cottages which are spoiling the look of the village green. The village has retained its village school, pubs and stores and consider themselves self-sufficient. { Rowlands castle surgery friends:-} This was formed in June 1984 with just 5 villagers, who held fundraising events to raise money for equipment in the village surgery. They were hoping to purchase an E.C.G. machine early in 1985.
